function.name: boosterWindStrengthMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the wind strength mode on a connected SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the wind strength mode.

predefinedBoosterWindStrengthMode.description: The predefined wind strength mode to set.
